reviews.review: Это. Просто. Охуенно.

Half-Life Released in November 19, 1998. E3 1998 
Game Critics Awards for "Best PC Game" and "Best Action Game".
Perfect game for you if you like old school first person shooters.Half-Life has no "levels"; it instead divides the game into chapters. Valve released two demos for Half-Life. The first, Half-Life: Day One, contained the first fifth of the game and was distributed with certain graphic cards. The second demo, Half-Life: Uplink, was released on February 12, 1999, and featured original content.Game of the decade definitely for me and gldsrc engine is very good for that time .In Half-Life, players assume the role of the protagonist, Dr. Gordon Freeman, a recent MIT graduate in theoretical physics, and also a recent employee at Black Mesa. After an experiment that goes horribly awry when an unexpected Resonance Cascade (an apparently completely fictitious occurrence) rips dimensional seams that devastate the facility, Gordon must fight to escape the now alien-infested facility as creatures from another world known as Xen subsequently enter through these dimensional seams.And of course i can recommend Half-Life

Давно обращал внимание на эту игру, из за её маленьких системных требований и потерясоящего на то время (да и в данное время играть интересно) геймплея, НО за 259 Рублей это слишком. На то далёкое время эта цена оправдывала качество продукта, но щас совершенно нет, я бы дал этой игре в современных реалиях рублей 75. Эта большая цена не давала мне купить эту игру. Тут проходит 2 года и я вижу что она на летней распродаже стоит со всеми DLC и TF classic всего 76 рублей. Я естественно покупаю и радуюсь этой игре.
Пройдёмся по ГЕЙМПЛЕЮ И СЮЖЕТУ.
Мы играем за Гордона Фримена. Он имеет учёную степень доктора философии (западный аналог кандидата наук) в области теоретической физики, присуждённую ему Массачусетским технологическим институтом (MIT). Наш дохтор приезжает в черную мезу где он открывает с помощью камня который дал Чёрной мезе таинственный персонажаж g man. С помощью этого камня Фримен открывает портал в мир Зен. Из мира Зен приходят монстры и задача Фримена перебить монстров и закрыть портал в этот мир.
ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ:
Геймплей классный что ещё сказать мне понравился.
本来呢又是一部补票作，还记得小时候从一开始的爬爬虫就害怕，突然扑你脸上的那种惊悚，现在适应了生化危机的恐惧难度，我不知道这个1998年的游戏用如此画质是如何一直占据在我的恐惧上的，很遗憾没有机会补完它了，这次耐着性子玩了一个多小时，配合声效的话，玩久了会越来越恐惧，我受不了管道关了，就这样吧。萝卜青菜各有所爱，我爱半条命系列，但我是个废物。好评留给FPS的先祖。

This game is an amazing spectacle into the modified Quake Engine, GoldSource. This game is a grand thing and was ahead of its time. The only bad thing is that it gets rather poor in Surface Tension and beyond, which is pretty sad.
 But the good thing is, is that It can be modded, meaning you can install Gunman Chronicles, a good GoldSource game that's now abandonware. Or even install Crack Life if you're into that stupid crap that I enjoy in a modding scene.
 In case you're wondering: You can't BHop anymore and you also can't Tau Jump in the Campaign, sadly these were both patched a while ago which is sad. Hopefully Valve makes some sort of alternate version where you can relive the original game without any of the patches from the current day.
 Half Life also has MULTIPLAYER, although it's not big, it is still fun to pit against the many players who still roam the servers! I recommend it!

ПЕРВАЯ ЧАСТЬ ИГРЫ ПРО САНТЕХНИКА ПЕТРОВИЧА, 
В ЛАБАРАТОРИЕ БЛЕК МАЙОНЕЗА ПРОИСХОДИТ БАБАХ И ПОЯВЛЯЮТСЯ ЧЕБУРЕКИ ПРЫГАЮЩИЕ НА ГОЛОВЫ И ДЕЛАЮЩИЕ ТИБЯ ЗАМБИ, ЕСТЬ ВАРТИГАНТЫ СТРЕЛЯЮЩИЕ ЛУЧАМИ КАЛА, КАКИЕТО АГРАМЕННЫЕ ДЕБЫЛИ СТРЕЛЯЮЩИМИ МУХАМИ И ЧЯРВЯКИ БАХУЮЩИЕ ТИБЯ И СЯМОЕ СТРАШНОЕ ЭТО АГРАМЕННЫЕ ТВАРИ КОТОРЫЕ ЖИВУТ В МУТНОЙ ВАДЕ И ОНИ СТРАШНЫЕ КАПЕЦ, Я КАГДА ИГРАЛ ТАК ОБОСИРАЛСЯ, ТАКЖЕ БУДЕТ ВОЕВАТЬ ПРОТИВ ТИБЯ ГОСДЕП США ОН НА ТИБЯ ОТПРАВИТ СОТНИ СОЛДАТ И АБРАМСОВ И БОССАВ ВЕРТОЛЁТОВ,НО  РУСКИЙ ПЯТРОВИЧ ИХ ВСЕХ ПОДОБЬЁТ ИЗ КАЛАКА, ТАКЖЖЕ БУДЕТ МНАГА ГАЛАВА ЛОМАК, У МЕНЯ ВНАТУ ГОЛОВА С НИХ ЛОМАНУЛАСЬ . КОРЕЧЕ ПОКУПАЙТЕ ВСЕ ЛУТЩАЯ ИГРА

A bit clunky, graphics are old, platforming suck major ass and it can get a bit confusing with the map layout.
Other than that, it's awesome as hell, and note that I played it for the first time at 2020, so no nostalgia glasses. Every location (especially when you get to the second half of the game) feels different and really interesting. I've been using every weapon (well not the grenades and bombs really) all throughout the game, so none of them are really redundant. It can get kinda hard at times. Graphics are old but definitely not outdated. Near the end of the game, when you get into those weird limbo/space/open kinds of maps it can honestly get worth to stare at for a moment and enjoy the scenery.
I doesn't focus on the storyline much so you could say it is just run 'n' shoot game, but here it doesn't matter at all.
I recommend playing this by 1-2 hour parts before sleep/work/school... You get instant action and relax you need. If you would play this in 5-10 hours span, you could get frustrated and bored.
Bottom of it all, just fuckin' play it. This is like Mortal Kombat of FPSs. 
(omg, '98? These devs must have been out of their minds to pull out a game of this magnitude in the age of mid-psone)

Rarely do you find a shooter from the late 90s that still holds up in 2020. It's community is still alive and well, mostly due to Half Lifes incredible modding scene, you can really get lost for hours with how much community content there is for this game. The ONLY downside I can think of is that the game breaks at higher FPS caps.

Sopa de cangrejos

El caldo de cangrejos es una sopa deliciosa que se consume generalmente en familia. Su preparación es muy sencilla y hará que todos quieran repetirse.

Preparación: 1 hora 
Porciones: 10 

Ingredientes
10 cangrejos limpios (lavar bien)
1 cebolla paiteña cortada finamente
1 pimiento cortados en cuadritos
2 ramas de cebolla blanca cortadas finamente
2 cucharadas de aceite de achiote
4 maduros cortados en rodajas
1 taza de pasta de maní
6 vasos de agua
Sal y pimienta al gusto.

Preparación
1-Realizar el refrito con la cebolla blanca, colorada, el pimiento y el  achiote.
2-Agregar los cangrejos en una olla conjuntamente con el refrito, añadir agua hasta cubrir completamente los cangrejos. 
3-Añadir los maduros a la sopa, dejar cocinar por 30 minutos.
4-Disolver la pasta de maní con un poco agua y agregar a la sopa, dejar cocinar por 10 minutos más y remover lentamente.
5-Retirar del fuego y listo para servir.
Really good for the 90's. Still holds up today, except for the freaking platforming. SMH.

Half life changed how video games were made when it came out in November 1998. It introduced story elements past "Shoot thing, kill thing" that was seen in classic DOOM and others like it. It pioneered the use of skeletal animation in video games, and without it, we wouldn't have TF2 or Counter-Strike. Its graphics, while dated today, were revolutionary for 1998, and it is a must-have for anyone who plays video games.
Gordon Susman

remember the old saying save, save, save, that jump gave me a bit of trouble just crouch walk to the edge and jump. now after Zen you meet the big boss if you have saved the max ammo in all weapons the go for Nihilanth if not knock out the yellow shards sticking out of the walls, your sent to another level kill the two legged creatures quick, dive in and get ammo quick look out for water creature, keep your ammo one small ledges ammo and health jump into water. other end jump up and out to boss, hide behind rock close to him use arrows shots marked with yellow blood, use 99% of all ammo except rockets, then go for rockets  you must be loaded up wit these otherwise it wont work good luck

Half-Life was a revolutionary game at its age. 
DOOM invent FPS, and Half-Life invents story-telling on it.
Playing this game today, it's certainly not easy.
The control is weird and clunky, and the level design is sometimes unfair and no clear enough.
But I still glad I beat it because this is a game that affects all FPS later on. You can even call it "The origin of modern-day FPS".
